web_snippets: Kristine Kimmel is a writer and a host of the How To Survive (@PodHowToSurvive) podcast. She opens up about how therapy saved her marriage and what it's like ...
Kristine Kimmel. Writer: Rule the Mix. Kristine Kimmel is known for Rule the Mix (2011), The Dish (2008) and Killer Karaoke (2012).
Kristine Kimmel is a Los Angeles based writer with multiple television credits. She has an MFA from Antioch University and a memoir currently out on submission.
